alert.note: Alert for Amite; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Wilkinson and western Amite Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 630 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Garden City to near Gloster. Movement was west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Centreville, Gloster and Crosby. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in New Orleans.
